name: Player Driven RPG "Unwritten: Echoes of Twilight"
blurb: An open world, player driven, fantasy RPG where player choice determines the direction, flow, and outcome of an ever evolving story

rewards.reward: -\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605HERO\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605- For LESS than a latte you can save our dream and be a true hero! Toss your lot in with us and receive an Exclusive Unwritten Wallpaper Set, a unique Backer badge on our forums, early access to our playable demo, backer credit in our readme, an exclusive Unwritten digital postcard, and our eternal thanks for saving the day!!
\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605COMMONER\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\n\r\nAn Exclusive Kickstarter Backer Wallpaper, a unique Backer badge on our forums and our thanks for being awesome!!

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605HERO\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605 For LESS than a latte you can save our dream and be a true hero! Toss your lot in with us and receive an Exclusive Unwritten Wallpaper Set, a unique Backer badge on our forums, early access to our playable demo, backer credit in our readme, an exclusive Unwritten postcard, and our eternal thanks for saving our dream!!
\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605ADVENTURER\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605 \r\nInsider Access Pass to our Backer Forum with a Backer Forum Tag, Early Updates, and News!

-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605HUNTER\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\r\nAn Early Release, DRM Free, Digital Copy of the Finished Game on YOUR CHOICE of available platforms PLUS Unlock the Exclusive Kickstarter Achievement and get your name added to our Beta Tester pool for a chance at being a Beta Tester!!

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605GUILDSMAN\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nAn Early Release, DRM Free, Digital Copy of the Finished Game on YOUR CHOICE of available platforms, A Limited Kickstarter Edition Digital Soundtrack from Unwritten: Echoes of Twilight (22 Tracks) Featuring Exclusive Game Art PLUS a Bonus Digital Copy of the game for a friend!!
\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605GUILDMASTER\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nUpgrade from GUILDSMAN level to Receive an Access Pass to Our Alpha Game PLUS a Signed Digital Game Map!

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605PADFOOT\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nKickstarter Exclusive Weapons Pack Quest DLC: "Bowrick's Arsenal" Quest deep into the ruins of the infamous Nagaten Prison to learn the truth about Bowrick's fate and recover his legendary arsenal...if you can. PLUS a Druid Gameworks Decal (black or white)

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605SHADOW\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nExclusive Voter Pass! Cast Your Vote in Developer Polls to Push the Content YOU want to see into the game! PLUS a 1-Disc Physical Boxed Copy of our Game for Windows PC!

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605RANGER\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nKickstarter Exclusive Armor Pack Quest DLC: "The Falconer" Quest to restore the falconer's armor and learn the secrets of this ancient trade with your Falcon companion! PLUS Kickstarter Exclusive DLC: "Heritage": Choose your inheritance and unlock a family legacy that will help you begin your journey in style!

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605GUARDIAN\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nKickstarter Exclusive Quest DLC: Agenem's Sorrow!!! Travel to a new world in the footsteps of the lost patron Agenem; explore new terrains, creatures, and characters in your quest to complete the journey of a god!! PLUS a Signed Digital Postcard with Exclusive Game Art and Signatures from All Druid Developers!

-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605KNIGHT\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\r\nSigned Digital Artbook with Exclusive Behind the Scenes Game Art and Signatures from All Druid Developers! PLUS a Druid Logo or Echoes of Twilight T-shirt!

-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605MASTER\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nA 2 Disc Special Edition Physical Copy of our game for Windows PC, PLUS: A Physical Full Color Artbook and a digital Access Pass to our BETA GAME!

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605NOBLE\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nSee your likeness or avatar appear as an NPC extra in Unwritten: Echoes of Twilight! PLUS Receive a Lifetime Pass for a free digital copy of every future title in the Unwritten Series!

-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605PATRON\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\r\nKICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE Receive a Limited 3-Disc Boxed Collector's Edition of our Game for Windows PC, PLUS see the legend of your Patron self written into our universe lore!

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605LEGACY\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nReceive Special Thanks in our Credit Reel PLUS Join the Development Team on Skype and sit-in for two of our regular staff meetings with exclusive access to read insider info, make suggestions, and give feedback, straight to the team!

\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605UNWRITTEN\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605-\u2605\r\nReceive Executive Producer Credit in the game\u2019s Credit Reel! Bring a guest to Join you and the Developers for a Launch Party in St Louis to receive all your rewards in person and signed by the team! PLUS get a special Druid Gameworks Staff T-Shirt with your Name!
